name: Modern Drone Air Attack Mission
description:
Modern Drone Air Attack Mission is the most epic military warfare game that offers an addictive mixture of strategy, fast-paced combat and real rc drone games with a real camera action!
Features:
- Destruction accompanied battlefield sound effects
- Different kind of Missiles and Bullets to destroy the Enemies Areas
- Shadow shooting combat
- Mega destruction of enemy tanks, trucks, buildings and soldiers
- 3D vivid Graphical representation
